suncertify.db
Interface LockManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CombinedTable
public interface LockManager

This class keeps track of which objects are locked. Implementers of this interface must be thread safe. Implementers do not necessarily know anything about the types of objects that are locked.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getLockOwner(int recordNumber)
          Get the owner of a given record lock.
 void lock(int recordNumber, java.lang.Object client)
          Lock a record.
 void unlock(int recordNumber, java.lang.Object client)
          Unlock a record.
 

Method Detail

lock

void lock(int recordNumber,
          java.lang.Object client)
          throws RecordNotFoundException
Lock a record. The current thread will wait until the lock is available.

Parameters:
recordNumber - the record number to lock
client - the lock owner
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record does not exist or is deleted

unlock

void unlock(int recordNumber,
            java.lang.Object client)
            throws RecordNotFoundException
Unlock a record. The lock must be currently owned by the client.

Parameters:
recordNumber - the record number to unlock
client - the lock owner
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record does not exist or is deleted

getLockOwner

java.lang.Object getLockOwner(int recordNumber)
                              throws RecordNotFoundException
Get the owner of a given record lock.

Parameters:
recordNumber - the record number
Returns:
the owner of the lock (null if not locked)
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record does not exist or is deleted
